mapper.select: /* [com.coway.trust.biz.sales.salesDashboardApi.impl.SalesDashboardApiMapper.selectSalesDashboard] 20191223 - KR JAEMAJEM */ SELECT A.ID AS ID , A.MEM_ID AS MEM_ID , A.MEM_CODE AS MEM_CODE , A.MEM_TYPE AS MEM_TYPE , A.YEAR AS YEAR , A.MONTH AS MONTH , A.TOT_SALES AS TOT_SALES , A.NET_SALES AS NET_SALES , A.SHI AS SHI , A.PV_TOT AS PV_TOT , A.OWN_PURCHASE AS OWN_PURCHASE , A.HS_SUCCESS_RATE AS HS_SUCCESS_RATE , A.COLLECTION_RATE AS COLLECTION_RATE , A.REJOIN AS REJOIN , A.MEMBERSHIP AS MEMBERSHIP , A.UPD_USER_ID AS UPD_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DT, 'DD.MM.YYYY') AS UPD_DT FROM REP0102T A WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId} AND A.YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND A.MONTH = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')
